text: Dasril Panin Datuk Labuan (6 August 1947 â€“ 13 February 2022) was an Indonesian politician. He was a member of Golkar and later the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle. He was in the People's Representative Council from 1982 to 1987 and again from 1993 to 2003. Datuk Labuan was born in Pulau Punjung, West Sumatra, Dutch East Indies. Datuk Labuan died at a hospital in Bukittinggi, Indonesia on 13 February 2022, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:West Sumatra
title: Dasril Panin Datuk Labuan
